name: Evolve Partners
overview: Evolve Partners provides in house and personalized outsourced IT support services and enterpise level private cloud hosting to companies that are in the small to medium business space. Evolve is a Tier 3 Microsoft Office 365 partner and can provide a business with a fully outsourced IT support model (including a dedicated IT director), complete private cloud hosting, and enterprise messaging and collaboration tools for a fraction of the cost of implementing these services with existing working capital. Evolve operates in a subscription model that moves traditional capital expenses into operational expenses that provide strategic tax advantages as well as time to market efficencies and scalability for your business.
